title: AI Ethics Framework for 2025
author: Dr. Sarah Chen
content: The development of artificial intelligence continues to accelerate, bringing with it unprecedented capabilities and challenges. This framework proposes a set of ethical guidelines for AI development and deployment in 2025 and beyond. Key principles include transparency, fairness, accountability, privacy, and human oversight. Organizations must ensure AI systems are explainable, free from bias, properly governed, protective of personal data, and always subject to human control.
